input.sentences: the group went out to the wilderness to go on a nature hike .
the family and friends enjoyed spending this time together .
they hiked along the trail at a brisk pace .
being able to take their time made it more fun .
at the end of the hike they returned to the motel they were staying at .
output.sentences: We have all gathered for an outing
We are going on a nature walk
We finally make it to the small village
